name: masterfully
content:
masterfully adverb
(SKILLED)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a very skilful way: She wrote a masterfully crafted piece for violin. The portraits are masterfully rendered by delicate brushwork.
More examplesFewer examplesThe masterfully detailed, hand-crafted work uses a variety of mediums including photography, paint, and collage. The actor masterfully evolved his character from villain to comic to romantic lead and, ultimately, to tragic hero.His life is revealed masterfully by his biographer.

masterfully adverb
(CONTROLLING)
in a way that confidently controls people or situations: The Russian reformer presided masterfully over the last days of the Soviet Union.
More examplesFewer examplesHe masterfully controlled the team's offense.She handles her subordinates masterfully.He commanded them masterfully to stop.
